discussion_comments.comment_body: This is very risky. First any push that `peter-evans` & collaborators does do the `v1` tag will automagically run in our env and secondly we give this action access to the PAT. If we are going to rely on any third-party actions we need to commit hash pin them (which is it's own sort of maintenance pain).
